name: Skyward Spine
title: Carving Black Wings: Skyward Spine
desc: A spear that can hold up the skies. It was this unshakable resolve that sustained the wind dragon through its mortal battle against its vile nemesis.
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Once per Round: This character's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.

A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
